actions.text: Reported to House from the Committee on Rules, H. Rept. 96-108.
Measure laid on table in House, H. Res. 274 passed in lieu.

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 111) to provide for the operation and maintenance of the Panama Canal and to provide for the exercise of the rights and performance of the duties of the United States provided in the Panama Canal Treaty of 1977.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for consideration of H.R. 111 (Panama Canal Treaty implementation).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 111) to provide for the operation and maintenance of the Panama Canal and to provide for the exercise of the rights and performance of the duties of the United States provided in the Panama Canal Treaty of 1977.
